label: rec28
comment: Codes for Types of Means of Transport

values.label: Grain vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry grain.

values.label: Timber/log carrier
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry logs and timber.

values.label: Wood chips vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry wood chips.

values.label: Steel products vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry steel products.

values.label: Carrier, general cargo/container
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry general cargo and containers.

values.label: Temperature controlled cargo vessels
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry temperature-controlled cargo.

values.label: Unit carrier
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry unit loads

values.label: Full container ship/cellular vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry containers only.

values.label: RoRo vessel
values.comment: Vessel with ramp designed to carry roll-on/roll-off cargo.

values.label: Car carrier
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry automotive vehicles or their knock-down parts.

values.label: Livestock carrier
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry livestock.

values.label: Barge carrier â€“ Lash ship
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry barges. Lash means lighters aboard ship.

values.label: Chemical carrier
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry chemicals in bulk or drums not in tanks.

values.label: Irradiated fuel carrier
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry irradiated fuel.

values.label: Heavy cargo vessel
values.comment: Ship designed to carry heavy cargo.

values.label: RoRo/Container vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry both containers and roll-on/roll-off cargo.

values.label: Bulk carrier
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry bulk cargo.

values.label: Dry bulk carrier
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry dry bulk (expellers).

values.label: Ore carrier
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry ore.

values.label: Cement carrier
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry cement.

values.label: Gravel carrier
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry gravel.

values.label: Coal carrier
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry coal.

values.label: Tanker
values.comment: Vessel solely equipped with tanks to carry cargo.

values.label: Crude oil tanker
values.comment: Tanker designed to carry crude oil.

values.label: Chemical tanker, coaster
values.comment: Tanker designed to carry chemicals in coastal traffic.

values.label: Chemical tanker, deep sea
values.comment: Tanker designed to carry chemicals in deep sea.

values.label: Oil and other derivatives tanker
values.comment: Tanker designed to carry oil and other derivatives.

values.label: Liquefied gas tanker
values.comment: Tanker designed to carry liquefied gas.

values.label: LPG tanker
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG).

values.label: LNG tanker
values.comment: Tanker designed to carry Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG).

values.label: LNG/LPG tanker
values.comment: Tanker designed to carry Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG) and Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG).

values.label: Other special tanker
values.comment: Tanker designed to carry other special liquids.

values.label: Asphalt/bitumen tanker
values.comment: Tanker designed asphalt and bitumen.

values.label: Molasses tanker
values.comment: Tanker designed to carry molasses.

values.label: Vegetable oil tanker
values.comment: Tanker designed to carry vegetable oil.

values.label: Cargo and passenger vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry cargo and passengers.

values.label: Passenger ship
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry more than 12 passengers.

values.label: Cruise ship
values.comment: Passenger ship designed to carry tourists on specified routes.

values.label: Ferry
values.comment: Vessel designed to ply regularly between two or more ports.

values.label: Other passenger ship
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry passengers, not otherwise specified.

values.label: Passenger ship, sailing
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry passengers and mainly propelled by sails.

values.label: Assistance vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to give assistance.

values.label: Tug, without tow
values.comment: Vessel designed to tow objects but sailing alone.

values.label: Tug, with tow
values.comment: Vessel designed to tow, and towing an object.

values.label: Salvage vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to salvage.

values.label: Rescue vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to effect rescue operations.

values.label: Oil combat vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to combat oil spills.

values.label: Oil rig
values.comment: Object designed for drilling oil at sea.

values.label: Hospital vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to serve as a hospital at sea.

values.label: Other sea-going vessel
values.comment: Sea-going vessel, not otherwise specified.

values.label: Pilot boat
values.comment: Vessel designed to convey pilots to/from ships.

values.label: Patrol/measure ship
values.comment: Vessel designed to guard, patrol or measure.

values.label: Work ship
values.comment: Vessel designed to assist in work.

values.label: Supply vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to provide supplies.

values.label: Offshore support vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to provide offshore support.

values.label: Pontoon
values.comment: Flat-bottomed vessel with a flat deck.

values.label: Stone dumping vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to dump stones.

values.label: Cable layer
values.comment: Vessel designed to lay cable.

values.label: Buoyage vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to handle buoys.

values.label: Icebreaker
values.comment: Vessel designed to break ice.

values.label: Pipelaying vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed to lay pipe.

values.label: Push boat
values.comment: Vessel designed to push other vessels.

values.label: Dredger
values.comment: Vessel designed to scoop or suck mud or sand.

values.label: Fishing boat
values.comment: Vessel designed for fishing.

values.label: Trawler
values.comment: Vessel designed to drag a bag-like net.

values.label: Cutter
values.comment: Small vessel that sometimes can be carried on a larger ship.

values.label: Factory ship
values.comment: Vessel designed as a fish factory.

values.label: Research and education ship
values.comment: Vessel designed for research and education.

values.label: Fishery research vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed for fishery research.

values.label: Climate registration vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed for climate registration.

values.label: Ship for environmental measurement
values.comment: Vessel designed for environmental monitoring and measurement.

values.label: Scientific vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed for scientific purposes.

values.label: Sailing school ship
values.comment: Vessel designed for training, powered by sail.

values.label: Training vessel
values.comment: Vessel designed for training.

values.label: Navy vessel
values.comment: Vessel operated by a Navy.

values.label: Structure, floating
values.comment: Any floating structure.

values.label: Crane, floating
values.comment: A crane mounted on a barge or pontoon.

values.label: Dock, floating
values.comment: A submersible floating structure used as a dock.

values.label: Pleasure boat
values.comment: Vessel designed for recreation.

values.label: Speedboat
values.comment: Vessel designed for speed, often used for recreation.

values.label: Sailing boat with auxiliary motor
values.comment: Vessel designed primarily for sailing outfitted with an auxiliary motor.

values.label: Sailing yacht
values.comment: A specific type of vessel mostly used for pleasure and designed for sailing.

values.label: Boat for sport fishing
values.comment: Vessel designed for sport fishing.

values.label: Craft, pleasure, longer than 20 metres
values.comment: A pleasure craft equal or longer than 20 metres, used for purposes of sports and recreation and not financial gain.

values.label: Craft, pleasure, smaller than 20 metres
values.comment: A pleasure craft smaller than 20 metres, used for purposes of sports and recreation and not financial gain.

values.label: Craft, other, extra definitions and specifications
values.comment: A small craft with some extra definitions and specifications.

values.label: Craft, other, recreational
values.comment: Vessel designed for recreation, not otherwise specified.

values.label: Fast ship
values.comment: Fast, all-purpose vessel.

values.label: Hydrofoil
values.comment: Vessel with wing-like structure for skimming at high speed.

values.label: Catamaran, fast
values.comment: Fast vessel designed with two parallel hulls.

values.label: Train, railroad
values.comment: One or more rail wagons pulled or pushed by one or more locomotive units, or self-propelled, that move over rail tracks.

values.label: Train, passenger
values.comment: Train designed to carry passengers.

values.label: Train, super express
values.comment: Train designed for high speed.

values.label: Train, sleeper
values.comment: Passenger train that includes carriages for sleeping.

values.label: Train, passenger, hired group
values.comment: A chartered train.

values.label: Train, freight
values.comment: Train for carrying freight.

values.label: Blocktrain
values.comment: Train for carrying freight to the same destination.

values.label: Train, container
values.comment: Train for carrying containers.

values.label: Train, with one wagon
values.comment: Train with a single wagon for carrying freight.

values.label: Train, with more than one and less than 20 wagons
values.comment: Train with more than one and less than 20 wagons for carrying freight.

values.label: Train, with more than 20 wagons
values.comment: Train with more than 20 wagons for carrying freight.

values.label: Truck
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for hauling loads.

values.label: Truck, tanker
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with a tank.

values.label: Tractor
values.comment: Automotive Vehicle with an engine designed for pulling.

values.label: Van
values.comment: Closed automotive vehicle designed for carrying freight.

values.label: Van, delivery
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for making fast deliveries.

values.label: Van, light
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for light carriage.

values.label: Van, furniture
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying furniture.

values.label: Tiptanker
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed with a tank lifting capability.

values.label: Truck, dry bulk
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying dry bulk cargo.

values.label: Truck, container
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying containers.

values.label: Carrier, car
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying motorcars.

values.label: Truck, reefer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for the carriage of frozen cargo.

values.label: Truck, mail
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying mail.

values.label: Truck dump
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed with a cargo-dumping capability.

values.label: Truck, forklift
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for lifting cargo and heavy objects.

values.label: Loader, shovel
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for shoveling sand and other bulk material.

values.label: Truck, platform, fixed
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed with a fixed platform.

values.label: Carrier, straddle
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for lifting and transporting containers.

values.label: Crane, mobile
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with cargo crane.

values.label: Car, elevator
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with raisable work platform.

values.label: Bus
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying more than 8 passengers including the driver.

values.label: Bus, with trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with an attached trailer for carrying passengers and/or luggage.

values.label: Bus, highway
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for highway travel.

values.label: Bus, sightseeing
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for sightseeing.

values.label: Bus, airport/city
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to carry passengers and their baggage between an airport and a city and return.

values.label: Tractor, industrial
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for towing one or more trailers.

values.label: Truck, freezer with isothermic trailer,
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying frozen goods with a trailer designed for carrying temperature-controlled goods.

values.label: Truck, isothermic with isothermic trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with trailer designed to carry temperature-controlled goods.

values.label: Truck, refrigerated with isothermic trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying refrigerated goods with a trailer designed for carrying temperature-controlled goods.

values.label: Truck, freezer with refrigerated trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying frozen goods with a trailer designed for carrying refrigerated goods.

values.label: Truck, isothermic with refrigerated trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to carry temperature-controlled goods with a trailer designed to carry refrigerated goods.

values.label: Truck, opening floor, with extendable trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with an opening floor with an extendable trailer.

values.label: Truck, rigid, with tank and tank trailer
values.comment: Rigid automotive vehicle designed with a tank with a tank trailer.

values.label: Truck, bulk with tank trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for bulk carrying with a tank trailer.

values.label: Truck, rigid with tank and bulk trailer
values.comment: Rigid automotive vehicle designed with a tank with a trailer capable of carrying bulk cargo and liquid.

values.label: Truck, bulk with bulk trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle and trailer both designed for carrying bulk cargo.

values.label: Truck, tautliner with extendable trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautliner vehicle with extendable trailer.

values.label: Truck, tautliner with removable roof and extendable trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautliner vehicle with removable roof and extendable trailer.

values.label: Truck, bulk truck with extendable trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying bulk cargo with an extendable trailer.

values.label: Truck, refrigerated with freezer trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying refrigerated goods with a trailer designed to carry frozen goods.

values.label: Truck, isothermic with freezer trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying temperature-controlled goods with a trailer designed for carrying frozen goods.

values.label: Truck, furniture with trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying furniture with a trailer.

values.label: Truck, tautliner with furniture trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautliner vehicle with trailer designed for carrying furniture.

values.label: Truck, tautliner, removable roof with furniture trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautliner vehicle designed with a removable roof with a trailer designed for carrying furniture.

values.label: Truck, tip-up with gondola trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed with a tip-up capability with a gondola trailer.

values.label: Truck, tautliner with gondola trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautliner vehicle with a gondola trailer.

values.label: Truck, tautliner, with removable roof and gondola trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautliner vehicle with removable roof and a gondola trailer.

values.label: Truck, opening floor with gondola trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with an opening floor and with a gondola trailer.

values.label: Truck, bulk with gondola trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying bulk cargo with a gondola trailer.

values.label: Truck, tip-up with extendable gondola trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed with a tip-up capability with an extendable gondola trailer.

values.label: Truck, tautliner with extendable gondola trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautliner vehicle with an extendable gondola trailer.

values.label: Truck, tautliner, removable roof with extendable gondola trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautliner vehicle designed with a removable rook and with an extendable gondola trailer.

values.label: Truck, opening floor with extendable gondola trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautliner vehicle designed with an opening floor and with an extendable gondola trailer.

values.label: Truck, bulk with extendable gondola trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying bulk cargo with an extendable gondola trailer.

values.label: Truck, tip-up truck with opening floor trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed with a tip-up capability with an opening-floor trailer.

values.label: Truck, tautliner with opening floor trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautliner vehicle with opening-floor trailer.

values.label: Truck, tautliner, removable roof, with opening floor trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautliner vehicle with a removable roof, with an opening-floor trailer.

values.label: Truck, opening-floor with opening-floor trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle and trailer both with opening floors.

values.label: Truck, bulk truck with opening- floor trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying bulk cargo with an opening-floor trailer.

values.label: Truck, with trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to pull a trailer, with a trailer attached.

values.label: Truck, tilt, with tilt trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with a tilt capability with a trailer also with a tilt capability.

values.label: Truck, refrigerated, with refrigerated trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to carry refrigerated goods with a trailer also capable or carrying refrigerated goods.

values.label: Truck, freezer with freezer trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle capable of carrying frozen goods with a trailer also capable of carrying frozen goods.

values.label: Truck, removal with removal trailer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to carry household effects with a trailer also capable of carrying household effects.

values.label: Truck, tautliner with removal trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautline truck with trailer capable of carrying household effects.

values.label: Truck, tautliner with removable roof and removal trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautline vehicle with removable roof and a trailer capable of carrying household effects.

values.label: Car, with caravan
values.comment: Automobile towing a house trailer.

values.label: Truck, tautliner, 25 tonne
values.comment: Automotive tautline vehicle with a 25 tonne capacity.

values.label: Truck, tautliner, 25 tonne with removable roof
values.comment: Automotive tautline vehicle with a 25 tonne capacity and a removable roof.

values.label: Lorry, articulated, flat bed, 25 tonne
values.comment: Articulated automotive vehicle with a flat bed and 25 tonne capacity.

values.label: Lorry, articulated, flat bed, 24 tonne, with 10 metre crane
values.comment: Articulated automotive vehicle with a flat bed and 25 tonne capacity with a 10 metre crane attached.

values.label: Lorry, articulated, flat bed, 24 tonne, with 15 metre crane
values.comment: Articulated automotive vehicle with a flat bed and 25 tonne capacity with a 15 metre crane attached.

values.label: Lorry, articulated, flat bed, 24 tonne, with 18 metre crane
values.comment: Articulated automotive vehicle with a flat bed and 25 tonne capacity with an 18 metre crane attached.

values.label: Lorry, articulated, flat bed, 10 tonne
values.comment: Articulated automotive vehicle with a flat bed and 10 tonne capacity.

values.label: Truck, tautliner, 25 tonne, with 90 cubic metre trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautline vehicle with a 25 tonne capacity and a 90 cubic metre trailer.

values.label: Truck, tautliner, 25 tonne, with 120 cubic metre trailer
values.comment: Automotive tautline vehicle with a 25 tonne capacity and a 120 cubic metre trailer.

values.label: Lorry, flat with trailer and 10 metre crane
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with flat bed and trailer and 10 metre crane.

values.label: Lorry, articulated with tank
values.comment: Articulated automotive vehicle with tank designed for carrying liquid or bulk goods.

values.label: Lorry, flat, 15 tonne
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with flat bed and a 15 tonne capacity.

values.label: Lorry, flat, 15 tonne with crane
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with flat bed and a 15 tonne capacity and attached crane.

values.label: Truck, isothermic
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to carry temperature-controlled goods.

values.label: Truck, refrigerated
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to carry refrigerated goods.

values.label: Van, freezer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to carry frozen goods.

values.label: Van, isothermic
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to carry temperature-controlled goods.

values.label: Van, refrigerated
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to carry refrigerated goods.

values.label: Truck, bulk
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to carry bulk goods.

values.label: Truck, tip-up
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed with a tip-up capability.

values.label: Truck, articulated, tip-up
values.comment: Articulated automotive vehicle designed with a tip-up capability.

values.label: Truck, rigid, with tank
values.comment: Rigid automotive vehicle designed with a tank.

values.label: Truck, tautliner
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with non-rigid sides.

values.label: Truck, tautliner, with removable roof
values.comment: Automotive tautline vehicle with a removable roof.

values.label: Truck, with opening floor
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with a floor that can be opened.

values.label: Truck, freezer
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to carry frozen goods.

values.label: Truck, with crane for moving goods, without trailer
values.comment: A truck with a crane for moving goods, without a trailer.

values.label: Truck, with crane for moving goods, with trailer
values.comment: A truck with a crane for moving goods, with a trailer.

values.label: Truck, with crane for lifting goods, without trailer
values.comment: A truck with a crane for lifting goods, without a trailer.

values.label: Truck, with crane for lifting goods, with trailer
values.comment: A truck with a crane for lifting goods, with a trailer.

values.label: Taxi cab
values.comment: Automotive vehicle licensed to ply for hire.

values.label: Truck, furniture
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for carrying furniture.

values.label: Truck, hydrant
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed for the delivery of fuel from a fixed installation to a means of transport.

values.label: Car
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed to carry a small number of passengers.

values.label: Truck, with tail-lift
values.comment: Automotive vehicle with a hydraulic lifting device on the rear of the vehicle for loading and unloading goods.

values.label: Armoured vehicle
values.comment: Automotive vehicle designed with fortified body for enhanced protection.

values.label: Aircraft, type unknown
values.comment: Aircraft of unknown type

values.label: Mail, type unknown
values.comment: Mail of unknown type

values.label: Multimodal, type unknown
values.comment: Multimodal transport of unknown type.

values.label: Fixed transport installation, type unknown
values.comment: Fixed transport installation of unknown type.

values.label: Pipeline
values.comment: A line of one or more pipes for continuous transport of liquid or gas commodity.

values.label: Powerline
values.comment: A line of one or more cables or wires for continuous transport of electricity.

values.label: Vessel, type unknown
values.comment: Vessel of unknown type.

values.label: Motor freighter
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying general cargo.

values.label: Motor tanker
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying liquid cargo in fixed cargo tanks.

values.label: Motor tanker, liquid cargo, type N
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying liquid cargo in cargo tanks, type N according to ADN.

values.label: Motor tanker, liquid cargo, type C
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying special liquid chemicals in cargo tanks, type C according to ADN.

values.label: Motor tanker, dry cargo
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying dry cargo as if liquid in fixed tanks (e.g. cement).

values.label: Container vessel
values.comment: Motorized vessel specially designed and equipped for carrying containers.

values.label: Gas tanker
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying gas in fixed cargo tanks, type G according to ADN.

values.label: Motor freighter, tug
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying cargo and capable of towing.

values.label: Motor tanker, tug
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying liquid cargo and capable to tow.

values.label: Motor freighter with one or more ships alongside
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying general cargo that has one or more vessels alongside.

values.label: Motor freighter with tanker
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying general cargo alongside a vessel designed for carrying liquid cargo.

values.label: Motor freighter pushing one or more freighters
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying general cargo, pushing one or more vessels also designed for carrying general cargo.

values.label: Motor freighter pushing at least one tank-ship
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying general cargo, pushing at least one vessel designed to carry a liquid cargo.

values.label: Tug, freighter
values.comment: Vessel designed to push or pull another vessel that is also capable of carrying general cargo.

values.label: Tug, tanker
values.comment: Vessel designed to push or pull another vessel also capable of carrying liquid cargo.

values.label: Tug, freighter, coupled
values.comment: Vessel designed to push or pull another vessel that is also capable of carrying general cargo tied to one or more other vessels.

values.label: Tug, freighter/tanker, coupled
values.comment: Vessel designed to push or pull another vessel that is also capable of carrying either general or liquid cargo tied to one or more other vessels.

values.label: Freight barge
values.comment: Lighter or Barge designed for carrying general cargo, either having no motive power of its own or having only sufficient motive power to perform restricted manoeuvres.

values.label: Tank barge
values.comment: Lighter or Barge designed for carrying liquid cargo in fixed tanks, either having no motive power of its own or having only sufficient motive power to perform restricted manoeuvres.

values.label: Tank barge, liquid cargo, typeÂ N
values.comment: Lighter or Barge designed for carrying liquid cargo in cargo tanks, type N according to ADN, either having no motive power of its own or having only sufficient motive power to perform restricted manoeuvres.

values.label: Tank barge, liquid cargo, typeÂ C
values.comment: Lighter or Barge designed to for carrying special liquid chemicals in cargo tanks, type C according to ADN, either having no motive power of its own or having only sufficient motive power to perform restricted manoeuvres.

values.label: Tank barge, dry cargo
values.comment: Lighter or Barge designed for carrying dry cargo in fixed tanks as if liquid (e.g. cement), either having no motive power of its own or having only sufficient motive power to perform restricted manoeuvres.

values.label: Freight barge with containers
values.comment: Lighter or Barge specially designed and equipped for carrying containers, either having no motive power of its own or having only sufficient motive power to perform restricted manoeuvres.

values.label: Tank barge, gas
values.comment: Lighter or Barge designed for carrying gas in cargo tanks, type G according to ADN, either having no motive power of its own or having only sufficient motive power to perform restricted manoeuvres.

values.label: Pushtow, one cargo barge
values.comment: Vessel designed for pushing/towing, facilitating the movement of one cargo barge.

values.label: Pushtow, two cargo barges
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, facilitating the movement of two cargo barges

values.label: Pushtow, three cargo barges
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, facilitating the movement of three cargo barges

values.label: Pushtow, four cargo barges
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, facilitating the movement four cargo barges

values.label: Pushtow, five cargo barges
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, facilitating the movement of five cargo barges.

values.label: Pushtow, six cargo barges
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, facilitating the movement of six cargo barges.

values.label: Pushtow, seven cargo barges
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, facilitating the movement of seven cargo barges.

values.label: Pushtow, eight cargo barges
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, facilitating the movement of eight cargo barges.

values.label: Pushtow, nine cargo barges
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, facilitating the movement of nine or more cargo barges.

values.label: Pushtow, one gas/tank barge
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, moving one tanker or gas barge.

values.label: Pushtow, two barges at least one tanker or gas barge
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, moving two barges of which at least one tanker or gas barge.

values.label: Pushtow, three barges at least one tanker or gasbarge
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, moving three barges of which at least one is a tanker or gas barge.

values.label: Pushtow, four barges at least one tanker or gasbarge
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, moving four barges of which at least one tanker or gasbarge.

values.label: Pushtow, five barges at least one tanker or gasbarge
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, moving five barges of which at least one tanker of gasbarge.

values.label: Pushtow, six barges at least one tanker or gasbarge
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, moving six barges of which at least one tanker or gasbarge.

values.label: Pushtow, seven barges at least one tanker or gasbarge
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, moving seven barges of which at least one tanker or gasbarge.

values.label: Pushtow, eight barges at least one tanker or gasbarge
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, moving eight barges of which at least one tanker or gasbarge.

values.label: Pushtow, nine or more barges at least one tanker or gasbarge
values.comment: Combination designed for pushing/towing, moving nine or more barges of which at least one tanker or gasbarge.

values.label: Tug, single
values.comment: Vessel specially designed to perform towing operations.

values.label: Tug, one or more tows
values.comment: Vessel designed for pushing another vessel that is involved in one or more concurrent tows.

values.label: Tug, assisting a vessel or linked combination
values.comment: Vessel designed for pushing another vessel that is assisting one vessel or a combination of vessels or tugs and vessels.

values.label: Pushboat, single
values.comment: Vessel specially designed for pushing a pushed convoy.

values.label: Passenger ship, ferry, red cross ship, cruise ship
values.comment: Vessels designed for carrying passengers.

values.label: Ferry
values.comment: Vessel designed for carrying passengers and/or vehicles on regular short voyages.

values.label: Red cross ship
values.comment: Passenger vessel with overnight passenger cabins designed for carrying sick and or disabled people.

values.label: Cruise ship
values.comment: Passenger vessel designed for carrying more than 12 passengers accommodated on board.

values.label: Passenger ship without accommodation
values.comment: Passenger vessel designed for carrying more than 12 passengers but without passenger accommodation such as cabins etc.

values.label: Day-trip high speed vessel
values.comment: Passenger vessel designed for carrying more than 12 passengers but without passenger accommodation such as cabins etc. capable of reaching speeds over 40 km/h in relation to water.

values.label: Day-trip hydrofoil vessel
values.comment: Passenger vessel designed for carrying more than 12 passengers but without passenger accommodation such as cabins etc., hydrofoil.

values.label: Sailing cruise ship
values.comment: Passenger vessel built and fitted out also with a view to propulsion under sail and designed for carrying more than 12 passengers accommodated on board.

values.label: Sailing passenger ship without accommodation
values.comment: Passenger vessel built and fitted out also with a view to propulsion under sail and designed for carrying more than 12 passengers but without passenger accommodation such as cabins etc.

values.label: Service vessel
values.comment: A tender (vessel for logistical support), dealing with the transport of small material and maintenance requirements outside the port area on rivers and other inland waterways.

values.label: Service vessel
values.comment: A tender (vessel for logistical support), dealing with the transport of small material and maintenance requirements outside the port area on rivers and other inland waterways.

values.label: Police patrol vessel
values.comment: A vessel for the supervision by police for the enforcement of applicable rules and regulations.

values.label: Port service vessel
values.comment: A port tender (vessel for logistical support), dealing with the transport of material and people within a port area.

values.label: Navigation surveillance vessel
values.comment: A vessel of the competent authority supervising waterway traffic and navigation to ensure safety and adherence to the respective rules and regulations.

values.label: Vessel, work maintenance craft, floating derrick, cable-ship, buoy-ship, dredge.
values.comment: Vessel designed to perform a specific type of work.

values.label: Object, towed, not otherwise specified.
values.comment: An object in tow that is not otherwise specified.

values.label: Fishing boat
values.comment: Vessel designed for fishing.

values.label: Bunkership
values.comment: Motorized vessel designed for carrying and delivering bunkers (products intended for the propulsion and operation of vessels) to other vessels, type N according to ADN.

values.label: Barge, tanker, chemical
values.comment: Vessel designed to carry liquid or bulk chemicals.

values.label: Object, not otherwise specified.
values.comment: A floating object that is not otherwise specified, i.e. a raft or other structure, object, establishment or assembly capable of  navigation, not being a vessel or floating equipment.

values.label: Service vessel
values.comment: A tender (vessel for logistical support), dealing with the transport of small material and maintenance requirements outside the port area on rivers and other inland waterways.

values.label: Police patrol vessel
values.comment: A vessel for the supervision by police of applicable rules and regulations.

values.label: Port service vessel
values.comment: A port tender (vessel for logistical support), dealing with the transport of material and people within a port area.

values.label: Navigation surveillance vessel
values.comment: A vessel of the competent authority (waterway) dealing with the surveillance of navigation.
